/usr/bin/c++  -fPIC    -fsigned-char -W -Wall -Werror=return-type -Werror=non-virtual-dtor -Werror=address -Werror=sequence-point -Wformat -Werror=format-security -Wmissing-declarations  -Winit-self -Wpointer-arith  -Wsign-promo -Wno-narrowing -Wno-delete-non-virtual-dtor -fdiagnostics-show-option -Wno-long-long -pthread -fomit-frame-pointer -msse -msse2 -mavx -mavx2 -mfma -ffunction-sections -fvisibility=hidden -fvisibility-inlines-hidden -fopenmp -Wno-undef -Wno-shadow -O3 -DNDEBUG  -DNDEBUG   -L/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/ -shared -Wl,-soname,libopencv_cudacodec.so.3.0 -o
